div.head: 諸獸傷
div.div: all types of harm caused four-legged animals

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all types of harm caused four-legged animals

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of bodily injuries received from animals attacking by biting, kicking, or scratching. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：諸獸傷：虎、狼、 熊、羆、豬、貓、犬、猘、驢、馬、鼠咬，人咬 , “ All types of harm caused by four-legged animals : tiger, wolf, bear, brown bear, pig, cat, dog, rabid dog, donkey, horse, as well as rat bites, and human bites”.
